property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are None (flat), Featured (drop shadow), and Outline (flat with border).

property.name: showFileType
property.label: Show Filter for File Type
property.description: Select to display the File Type filter.

property.name: showFileSize
property.label: Show Filter for File Size
property.description: Select to display the File Size filter.

property.name: showOwner
property.label: Show Filter for Created By
property.description: Select to display the Created By filter.

property.name: showModifier
property.label: Show Filter for Last Modified By
property.description: Select to display the Last Modified By filter.

property.name: showCreatedDate
property.label: Show Filter for Created Date
property.description: Select to display the Created Date filter.

property.name: showModifiedDate
property.label: Show Filter for Last Modified Date
property.description: Select to display the Last Modified Date filter.

property.name: showClear
property.label: Show Clear Button
property.description: Select to display the Clear All button.

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates this component to a specific list.
